attributes.mlflow.spanInputs:
{"database_schema": ""Description for table: Protocol"
type Protocol @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the protocol."
  id: ID!
  "Current inflation rate of the protocol."
  inflation: BigInt!
  "Change in the inflation rate since the last update."
  inflationChange: BigInt!
  "Number of transcoders currently active in the network."
  numActiveTranscoders: BigInt!
  "Count of transcoders that are active."
  activeTranscoderCount: BigInt!
  "Indicates whether the protocol is paused."
  paused: Boolean!
  "Target rate for bonding in the network."
  targetBondingRate: BigInt!
  "Period required for unbonding in the network."
  unbondingPeriod: BigInt!
  "Duration for which assets are locked."
  lockPeriod: BigInt!
  "Amount locked per round."
  roundLockAmount: BigInt!
  "Total stake actively participating in the network."
  totalActiveStake: BigDecimal!
  "Total volume of transactions in ETH."
  totalVolumeETH: BigDecimal!
  "Total volume of transactions in USD."
  totalVolumeUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Rate of participation in the network."
  participationRate: BigDecimal!
  "Current round of the protocol."
  currentRound: Round!
  "Last round that was initialized."
  lastInitializedRound: Round!
  "Round when the last round length update occurred."
  lastRoundLengthUpdateRound: Round!
  "Length of each round in the protocol."
  roundLength: BigInt!
  "Start block of the last round length update."
  lastRoundLengthUpdateStartBlock: BigInt!
  "Total supply of tokens in the protocol."
  totalSupply: BigDecimal!
  "Price of LPT in terms of ETH."
  lptPriceEth: BigDecimal!
  "Count of winning tickets in the current round."
  winningTicketCount: Int!
  "Total number of rounds completed."
  roundCount: Int!
  "List of transcoders pending activation."
  pendingActivation: [Transcoder!]!
  "List of transcoders pending deactivation."
  pendingDeactivation: [Transcoder!]!
  "Total number of delegators in the network."
  delegatorsCount: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: Transcoder"
type Transcoder @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the transcoder."
  id: ID!
  "Round in which the transcoder was activated."
  activationRound: BigInt!
  "Round in which the transcoder was deactivated."
  deactivationRound: BigInt!
  "Round of the last active stake update."
  lastActiveStakeUpdateRound: BigInt!
  "Indicates if the transcoder is currently active."
  active: Boolean!
  "Current status of the transcoder."
  status: TranscoderStatus!
  "Timestamp of when the transcoder was activated."
  activationTimestamp: Int!
  "Last round in which the transcoder received a reward."
  lastRewardRound: Round
  "Percentage of rewards cut by the transcoder."
  rewardCut: BigInt!
  "Timestamp of the last reward cut update."
  rewardCutUpdateTimestamp: Int!
  "Percentage of fees shared by the transcoder."
  feeShare: BigInt!
  "Timestamp of the last fee share update."
  feeShareUpdateTimestamp: Int!
  "Total stake delegated to the transcoder."
  totalStake: BigDecimal!
  "Total volume in ETH handled by the transcoder."
  totalVolumeETH: BigDecimal!
  "Volume in ETH handled over the last 30 days."
  thirtyDayVolumeETH: BigDecimal!
  "Volume in ETH handled over the last 60 days."
  sixtyDayVolumeETH: BigDecimal!
  "Volume in ETH handled over the last 90 days."
  ninetyDayVolumeETH: BigDecimal!
  "Total volume in USD handled by the transcoder."
  totalVolumeUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Pools associated with the transcoder, derived from the delegate field."
  pools: [Pool!] @derivedFrom(field: "delegate")
  "Delegators associated with the transcoder, derived from the delegate field."
  delegators: [Delegator!] @derivedFrom(field: "delegate")
  "Delegator associated with the transcoder."
  delegator: Delegator
  "URI for the transcoder's service."
  serviceURI: String
  "Daily records of the transcoder's activity."
  transcoderDays: [TranscoderDay!]!
}

"Description for enum type: TranscoderStatus"
enum TranscoderStatus @entity {
  "Indicates that the transcoder is not registered."
  NotRegistered
  "Indicates that the transcoder is registered."
  Registered
}

"Description for table: Pool"
type Pool @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the pool"
  id: ID!
  "Associated round for the pool"
  round: Round!
  "Delegate associated with the pool"
  delegate: Transcoder!
  "Total fees collected in the pool"
  fees: BigDecimal!
  "Total reward tokens distributed in the pool"
  rewardTokens: BigDecimal
  "Total stake in the pool"
  totalStake: BigDecimal!
  "Percentage of rewards cut by the delegate"
  rewardCut: BigInt!
  "Percentage of fees shared with delegators"
  feeShare: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: Round"
type Round @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the round."
  id: ID!
  "Timestamp indicating when the round started."
  startTimestamp: Int!
  "Indicates whether the round has been initialized."
  initialized: Boolean!
  "Duration of the round in blocks."
  length: BigInt!
  "Block number at which the round started."
  startBlock: BigInt!
  "Block number at which the round ended."
  endBlock: BigInt!
  "List of pools associated with the round, derived from the 'round' field in the Pool type."
  pools: [Pool!] @derivedFrom(field: "round")
  "Number of tokens that can be minted during the round."
  mintableTokens: BigDecimal!
  "Total volume of transactions in ETH during the round."
  volumeETH: BigDecimal!
  "Total volume of transactions in USD during the round."
  volumeUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total amount of stake actively participating in the round."
  totalActiveStake: BigDecimal!
  "Total supply of tokens at the end of the round."
  totalSupply: BigDecimal!
  "Rate of participation in the round."
  participationRate: BigDecimal!
  "Amount of stake that was moved during the round."
  movedStake: BigDecimal!
  "Amount of new stake added during the round."
  newStake: BigDecimal!
  "Inflation rate applied during the round."
  inflation: BigInt!
  "Number of transcoders actively participating in the round."
  numActiveTranscoders: BigInt!
  "Count of active transcoders during the round."
  activeTranscoderCount: BigInt!
  "Number of delegators participating in the round."
  delegatorsCount: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: Delegator"
type Delegator @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the delegator"
  id: ID!
  "Reference to the associated Transcoder entity"
  delegate: Transcoder
  "The round in which the delegator started"
  startRound: BigInt!
  "The last round in which the delegator claimed rewards"
  lastClaimRound: Round
  "The amount currently bonded by the delegator"
  bondedAmount: BigDecimal!
  "The principal amount of the delegator"
  principal: BigDecimal!
  "The amount that is unbonded and available"
  unbonded: BigDecimal!
  "Total fees earned by the delegator"
  fees: BigDecimal!
  "Fees that have been withdrawn by the delegator"
  withdrawnFees: BigDecimal!
  "Total amount delegated by the delegator"
  delegatedAmount: BigDecimal!
  "List of unbonding locks associated with the delegator"
  unbondingLocks: [UnbondingLock!] @derivedFrom(field: "delegator")
}

"Description for table: LivepeerAccount"
type LivepeerAccount @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the Livepeer account"
  id: ID!
  "Timestamp of the last update to the account, represented as an integer"
  lastUpdatedTimestamp: Int!
  "Reference to the associated delegator entity"
  delegator: Delegator
  "Reference to the associated delegate entity, typically a transcoder"
  delegate: Transcoder
}

"Description for table: Broadcaster"
type Broadcaster @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the broadcaster"
  id: ID!
  "Amount of deposit held by the broadcaster"
  deposit: BigDecimal!
  "Amount reserved by the broadcaster"
  reserve: BigDecimal!
}

"Description for table: UnbondingLock"
type UnbondingLock @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the unbonding lock"
  id: ID!
  "Identifier for the specific unbonding lock"
  unbondingLockId: Int!
  "Reference to the delegator associated with the unbonding lock"
  delegator: Delegator!
  "Reference to the delegate (transcoder) associated with the unbonding lock"
  delegate: Transcoder!
  "Amount of tokens involved in the unbonding lock"
  amount: BigDecimal!
  "Round number when the unbonding lock can be withdrawn"
  withdrawRound: BigInt!
  "Address of the sender initiating the unbonding lock"
  sender: String!
}

"Description for table: Poll"
type Poll @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the poll"
  id: ID!
  "The proposal being voted on"
  proposal: String!
  "The block number at which the poll ends"
  endBlock: BigInt!
  "The minimum number of votes required for the poll to be valid"
  quorum: BigInt!
  "The percentage of votes required for the proposal to pass"
  quota: BigInt!
  "The tally of votes for the poll"
  tally: PollTally
  "List of votes cast in the poll"
  votes: [Vote!]!
}

"Description for table: PollTally"
type PollTally @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the poll tally"
  id: ID!
  "Number of affirmative votes"
  yes: BigDecimal!
  "Number of negative votes"
  no: BigDecimal!
}

"Description for table: Vote"
type Vote @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the vote"
  id: ID!
  "Identifier for the voter"
  voter: String!
  "Amount of stake used for voting"
  voteStake: BigDecimal!
  "Amount of stake not used for voting"
  nonVoteStake: BigDecimal!
  "Reference to the choice made in the poll"
  choiceID: PollChoice
  "Reference to the poll associated with the vote"
  poll: Poll
  "Indicates if the voter is a registered transcoder"
  registeredTranscoder: Boolean
}

"Description for enum type: PollChoice"
enum PollChoice @entity {
  "Represents an affirmative choice"
  Yes
  "Represents a negative choice"
  No
}

"Description for table: Day"
type Day @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the day"
  id: ID!
  "The date represented as an integer"
  date: Int!
  "Total volume in ETH for the day"
  volumeETH: BigDecimal!
  "Total volume in USD for the day"
  volumeUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total active stake for the day"
  totalActiveStake: BigDecimal!
  "Total supply for the day"
  totalSupply: BigDecimal!
  "Participation rate for the day"
  participationRate: BigDecimal!
  "Inflation rate for the day"
  inflation: BigInt!
  "Number of active transcoders for the day"
  numActiveTranscoders: BigInt!
  "Count of active transcoders"
  activeTranscoderCount: BigInt!
  "Count of delegators"
  delegatorsCount: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: TranscoderDay"
type TranscoderDay @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the TranscoderDay entry"
  id: ID!
  "The date represented as an integer"
  date: Int!
  "The volume of transactions in Ethereum"
  volumeETH: BigDecimal!
  "The volume of transactions in US Dollars"
  volumeUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Reference to the associated Transcoder entity"
  transcoder: Transcoder!
}

"Description for table: TreasuryProposal"
type TreasuryProposal @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the treasury proposal"
  id: ID!
  "Account that proposed the treasury proposal"
  proposer: LivepeerAccount!
  "List of target addresses for the proposal"
  targets: [String!]!
  "List of values associated with the proposal"
  values: [BigInt!]!
  "List of calldata for executing the proposal"
  calldatas: [Bytes!]!
  "Block number when voting starts"
  voteStart: BigInt!
  "Block number when voting ends"
  voteEnd: BigInt!
  "Textual description of the proposal"
  description: String!
}

interface Event {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Timestamp of the event in Unix time format"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Transaction details associated with the event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Round information related to the event"
  round: Round!
}

"Description for table: Transaction"
type Transaction @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the transaction"
  id: ID!
  "Block number in which the transaction was included"
  blockNumber: BigInt!
  "Timestamp of when the transaction was processed"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Amount of gas used by the transaction"
  gasUsed: BigInt!
  "Price per unit of gas for the transaction"
  gasPrice: BigInt!
  "Address of the sender"
  from: String!
  "Address of the recipient"
  to: String!
  "List of events associated with the transaction"
  events: [Event!] @derivedFrom(field: "transaction")
}

"Description for table: BondEvent"
type BondEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the bond event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the bond event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Unix timestamp of when the bond event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the bond event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Amount of bond in the bond event"
  bondedAmount: BigDecimal!
  "Additional amount involved in the bond event"
  additionalAmount: BigDecimal!
  "New delegate assigned in the bond event"
  newDelegate: Transcoder!
  "Previous delegate before the bond event"
  oldDelegate: Transcoder
  "Delegator involved in the bond event"
  delegator: Delegator!
}

"Description for table: UnbondEvent"
type UnbondEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the unbond event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the unbond event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the unbond event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the unbond event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Amount involved in the unbond event"
  amount: BigDecimal!
  "Round when the withdrawal can be processed"
  withdrawRound: BigInt!
  "Identifier for the unbonding lock"
  unbondingLockId: Int
  "Transcoder to whom the delegator was bonded"
  delegate: Transcoder!
  "Delegator who initiated the unbond event"
  delegator: Delegator!
}

"Description for table: RebondEvent"
type RebondEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the rebond event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the rebond event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the rebond event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the rebond event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Delegator involved in the rebond event"
  delegator: Delegator!
  "Delegate (transcoder) involved in the rebond event"
  delegate: Transcoder!
  "Amount involved in the rebond event"
  amount: BigDecimal!
  "Identifier for the unbonding lock associated with the rebond event"
  unbondingLockId: Int!
}

"Description for table: TransferBondEvent"
type TransferBondEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the transfer bond event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the transfer bond event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the transfer bond event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round number during which the transfer bond event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Amount of the bond being transferred"
  amount: BigDecimal!
  "Delegator receiving the bond"
  newDelegator: Delegator!
  "Delegator transferring the bond"
  oldDelegator: Delegator!
  "Identifier for the new unbonding lock"
  newUnbondingLockId: Int!
  "Identifier for the old unbonding lock"
  oldUnbondingLockId: Int!
}

"Description for table: RewardEvent"
type RewardEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the reward event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the reward event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the reward event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the reward event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Amount of reward tokens distributed in the event"
  rewardTokens: BigDecimal!
  "Delegate associated with the reward event"
  delegate: Transcoder!
}

"Description for table: TranscoderActivatedEvent"
type TranscoderActivatedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction details"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of the event occurrence"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the event was activated"
  round: Round!
  "Transcoder that is being delegated"
  delegate: Transcoder!
  "Round in which the activation occurs"
  activationRound: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: TranscoderDeactivatedEvent"
type TranscoderDeactivatedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction details"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Time when the event occurred, represented as an integer"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Transcoder that was delegated"
  delegate: Transcoder!
  "Round in which the transcoder was deactivated"
  deactivationRound: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: EarningsClaimedEvent"
type EarningsClaimedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the earnings claimed event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the earnings claimed event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp when the earnings were claimed"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round number during which the earnings were claimed"
  round: Round!
  "Address of the delegator claiming the earnings"
  delegator: Delegator!
  "Address of the delegate associated with the earnings claim"
  delegate: Transcoder!
  "Starting round number for the earnings claim period"
  startRound: BigInt!
  "Ending round number for the earnings claim period"
  endRound: Round!
  "Amount of reward tokens claimed"
  rewardTokens: BigDecimal!
  "Amount of fees claimed"
  fees: BigDecimal!
}

"Description for table: TranscoderUpdateEvent"
type TranscoderUpdateEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Transcoder delegate involved in the event"
  delegate: Transcoder!
  "Percentage of rewards cut by the transcoder"
  rewardCut: BigInt!
  "Percentage of fees shared by the transcoder"
  feeShare: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: TranscoderSlashedEvent"
type TranscoderSlashedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp when the event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Transcoder that was slashed"
  delegate: Transcoder!
  "Address of the entity that found the issue"
  finder: Bytes!
  "Penalty amount imposed on the transcoder"
  penalty: BigDecimal!
  "Reward given to the finder"
  finderReward: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: TranscoderResignedEvent"
type TranscoderResignedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction details"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Event occurrence timestamp"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the event occurred"
  round: Round!
  "Transcoder who resigned"
  delegate: Transcoder!
}

"Description for table: TranscoderEvictedEvent"
type TranscoderEvictedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction details"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Time at which the event occurred, represented as an integer"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Transcoder that was evicted"
  delegate: Transcoder!
}

"Description for table: WithdrawStakeEvent"
type WithdrawStakeEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the withdraw stake event"
  id: ID!
  "Reference to the transaction associated with the event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round number during which the event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Delegator involved in the event"
  delegator: Delegator!
  "Identifier for the unbonding lock, if applicable"
  unbondingLockId: Int
  "Amount of stake withdrawn"
  amount: BigDecimal!
}

"Description for table: WithdrawFeesEvent"
type WithdrawFeesEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the withdraw fees event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the withdraw fees event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the withdraw fees event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round number associated with the withdraw fees event"
  round: Round!
  "Delegator involved in the withdraw fees event"
  delegator: Delegator!
  "Amount of fees withdrawn in the event"
  amount: BigDecimal!
  "Recipient of the withdrawn fees"
  recipient: String!
}

"Description for table: NewRoundEvent"
type NewRoundEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round information related to the event"
  round: Round!
  "Hash of the block containing the event"
  blockHash: String!
}

"Description for table: WinningTicketRedeemedEvent"
type WinningTicketRedeemedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the winning ticket redeemed event"
  id: ID!
  "Transaction associated with the winning ticket redemption"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the winning ticket was redeemed"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the winning ticket was redeemed"
  round: Round!
  "Broadcaster who sent the winning ticket"
  sender: Broadcaster!
  "Transcoder who received the winning ticket"
  recipient: Transcoder!
  "Face value of the winning ticket"
  faceValue: BigDecimal!
  "Face value of the winning ticket in USD"
  faceValueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Winning probability of the ticket"
  winProb: BigInt!
  "Nonce used by the sender for the winning ticket"
  senderNonce: BigInt!
  "Random number generated by the recipient"
  recipientRand: BigInt!
  "Auxiliary data associated with the winning ticket"
  auxData: Bytes!
}

"Description for table: DepositFundedEvent"
type DepositFundedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the deposit funded event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the deposit funded event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the deposit was funded"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the deposit was funded"
  round: Round!
  "Broadcaster who sent the deposit"
  sender: Broadcaster!
  "Amount of the deposit funded"
  amount: BigDecimal!
}

"Description for table: ReserveFundedEvent"
type ReserveFundedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the reserve funded event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the reserve funded event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the reserve was funded"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the reserve was funded"
  round: Round!
  "Entity holding the reserve"
  reserveHolder: Broadcaster!
  "Amount of funds added to the reserve"
  amount: BigDecimal!
}

"Description for table: ReserveClaimedEvent"
type ReserveClaimedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the reserve claimed event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the reserve claimed event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp when the reserve was claimed"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the reserve was claimed"
  round: Round!
  "Entity holding the reserve"
  reserveHolder: Broadcaster!
  "Entity claiming the reserve"
  claimant: Transcoder!
  "Amount of reserve claimed"
  amount: BigDecimal!
}

"Description for table: WithdrawalEvent"
type WithdrawalEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the withdrawal event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the withdrawal event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the withdrawal event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round number associated with the withdrawal event"
  round: Round!
  "Broadcaster who initiated the withdrawal"
  sender: Broadcaster!
  "Amount of deposit involved in the withdrawal"
  deposit: BigDecimal!
  "Reserve amount involved in the withdrawal"
  reserve: BigDecimal!
}

"Description for table: SetCurrentRewardTokensEvent"
type SetCurrentRewardTokensEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction details"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of the event occurrence"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round information related to the event"
  round: Round!
  "Amount of tokens that can currently be minted"
  currentMintableTokens: BigDecimal!
  "Current inflation rate as a large integer"
  currentInflation: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: PauseEvent"
type PauseEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the pause event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the pause event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp indicating when the pause event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round during which the pause event took place"
  round: Round!
}

"Description for table: UnpauseEvent"
type UnpauseEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the unpause event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the unpause event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp when the unpause event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round number associated with the unpause event"
  round: Round!
}

"Description for table: ParameterUpdateEvent"
type ParameterUpdateEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Time when the event occurred, represented as an integer"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Associated round for the event"
  round: Round!
  "Parameter value related to the event"
  param: String!
}

"Description for table: VoteEvent"
type VoteEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the vote event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction for the vote event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp of when the vote event occurred"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round in which the vote event took place"
  round: Round!
  "Identifier of the voter participating in the vote event"
  voter: String!
  "Identifier for the choice made in the vote event"
  choiceID: BigInt!
  "Poll associated with the vote event"
  poll: Poll!
}

"Description for table: PollCreatedEvent"
type PollCreatedEvent implements Event @entity {
  "Unique identifier for the poll event"
  id: ID!
  "Associated transaction details for the poll event"
  transaction: Transaction!
  "Timestamp when the poll event was created"
  timestamp: Int!
  "Round information related to the poll event"
  round: Round!
  "Poll details associated with the event"
  poll: Poll!
  "Proposal data in bytes format"
  proposal: Bytes!
  "Block number when the poll ends"
